# Grouparoo Support

If you are a user of the open source Grouparoo project, please open a new [Github Issue](https://github.com/grouparoo/grouparoo/issues/new) describing the problem. There is no stated SLA for resolving Github issues.

If you hold a paid Grouparoo subscription, please email help@grouparoo.com to start the support process.

Please visit www.grouparoo.com to learn more about our support options.
